Detailed Description

MiniMap is the small map in lower corner. it's displayed through some single texture. the people are drawn on top of this. when the height-map changes, the texture has to be changed. So there are two different functions (mapChanged*)

Two things you have to take care of: 1) you have to set a map with setMap 2) you have to set a scene (for frustum-display) (setScene)

because typically this object is created within an xml-layout-file
